name: Name
sent_all_amount: Be sure to send the exact amount of USDT.TRC20 your payment order is
how_make_payment:
Copy or scan you can copy the address that appears at the top and send it from your preferred exchange.
Important send only USDT.TRC20 (Red Tron) the exact amount, if you send to any different network your funds will be lost.
not_enough_money: We will contact,also you can send the rest to the address above.
platform_title: A complete payments platform designed to grow
platform_body: Accept payments and transfer money around the world with Site' powerful APIs and software solutions designed to help you generate more revenue.
factory_payments_body: From online stores to platforms or marketplaces, we offer a full range of solutions for all your payment needs.
quick_start_body: Create an online account in minutes and use our libraries and SDKs to securely accept payments. We will deposit your funds directly into your cold Wallet or if you prefer to a specific wallet.
security_body: All your data is protected because it is encrypted, only you have the power to use your money.
